column5: Two days ago I bought this. I pressed salesman for some sort of discount. I was happy with the deal. I still am, but wife is a shopper and came home today saying that Winners has the same BBQ for $249. I am a man and it would never occur to me to go to "Winners" for a BBQ. So, if you are interested, this was in London On.
Are you sure this wasn't the "Platinum" edition?  The Platinum has the side table but no gas assited start.  I find it hard to believe a new Performer for $250  Burt
I wise tool maker once told me.. "you get what you pay for".. I doubt they are the same quality.
Weber is a great product. Made in kitchener
If this is the Platinum one, that is a fantastic price if one is local to the Forest City. I'd snap that up if I could find that price here.
Weber charcoal grills are made in Hunley, Illinois.   Some Broil King / Broil Mate / Sterling grills are made in Kitchener by OMC (although OMC distributes Weber products in Canada).  Burt
Ok they used to be made in kitchener lol
